nodes.text: Chaf'pri'uhme, core name Afpriuh, was a Chiss male who held the rank of Senior Commander in the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet. He served aboard the heavy cruiser Springhawk under Senior Captain Thrawn as weapons officer.

Afpriuh played a pivotal role in destroying the fake Agbui nyix mine on Hoxim during the skirmish above Hoxim, thus preventing a scheme to cause a civil war among the Chiss from coming to fruition. Guided by sky-walker Che'ri's powers of Third Sight, Afpriuh aimed the weapons of the Springhawk in such a way to destroy shoot the Saltbarrel at the "mine" and destroy it and make it look accidental. As a result, the rival Great Families that sought to seize the supposed nyix mine could not fight over it.
